definition: fire that makes it difficult for the enemy to fire on your own individuals or formations, to clothe, as if for protection from the elements
details:
noun
- fire that makes it difficult for the enemy to fire on your own individuals or formations
= example: fire that makes it difficult for the enemy to fire on your own individuals or formations
= synonyms: covering fire
- the act of concealing the existence of something by obstructing the view of it
= example: the act of concealing the existence of something by obstructing the view of it
= synonyms: screening
- a false identity and background, especially one created for an undercover agent
= example: a false identity and background, especially one created for an undercover agent
- the protective covering on the front, back, and spine of a book
= synonyms: back, binding, book binding
- bedding that keeps a person warm in bed
= example: bedding that keeps a person warm in bed
= synonyms: blanket
- a recording of a song that was first recorded or made popular by somebody else
= example: a recording of a song that was first recorded or made popular by somebody else
= synonyms: cover version, cover song
- a covering that serves to conceal or shelter something
= synonyms: covert, concealment, screen
- covering for a hole (especially a hole in the top of a container)
= synonyms: top
- a natural object that covers or envelops
= example: a natural object that covers or envelops
= synonyms: covering
- a fixed charge by a restaurant or nightclub over and above the charge for food and drink
= synonyms: cover charge
verb
- to clothe, as if for protection from the elements
= example: to clothe, as if for protection from the elements
= synonyms: wrap up
- to sit on eggs
= synonyms: hatch, brood, incubate
- to protect, as by an insurance policy
= example: to protect, as by an insurance policy
= synonyms: insure, underwrite
- to be responsible for reporting the details of, as in journalism
= synonyms: report
- to maintain a check on
- to act on verbally or in some form of artistic expression
= synonyms: deal, handle, plow, address, treat
- to hold within range of an aimed firearm
- to protect or defend a position in a game
= example: to protect or defend a position in a game
- to be responsible for guarding an opponent in a game
- to play a higher card than the one previously played
= example: to play a higher card than the one previously played
- to form a cover over
= example: to form a cover over
= synonyms: spread over
- to provide with a covering or cause to be covered
= example: to provide with a covering or cause to be covered
- to put something on top of something else
= example: to put something on top of something else
= synonyms: overlay
- to copulate with a female, used especially of horses
= example: to copulate with a female, used especially of horses
= synonyms: breed
- to cover as if with a shroud
= synonyms: hide, shroud, enshroud
- to travel across or pass over
= example: to travel across or pass over
= synonyms: traverse
- to spread over a surface to conceal or protect
= example: to spread over a surface to conceal or protect
- to hide from view or knowledge
= example: to hide from view or knowledge
= synonyms: cover up
- to be sufficient to meet, defray, or offset the charge or cost of
= example: to be sufficient to meet, defray, or offset the charge or cost of
- to take an action to protect against future problems
= example: to take an action to protect against future problems
- to help out by taking someone's place and temporarily assuming their responsibilities
= example: to help out by taking someone's place and temporarily assuming their responsibilities
- to invest with a large or excessive amount of something
= example: to invest with a large or excessive amount of something
- to include in scope
= synonyms: embrace
- to make up for shortcomings or a feeling of inferiority by exaggerating good qualities
= synonyms: compensate, overcompensate
- to provide for
= example: to provide for
- to span an interval of distance, space or time
= synonyms: extend, continue
